snippet.title: Alekon Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Alekon began life as a spiritual successor to Pokemon Snap but has evolved into something unique. Solve puzzles to make the creatures strike collectable poses, then befriend them through various quests and minigames. Demo on Steam Feb. 3rd! https://s.team/a/1479390/
